Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-32621 affecting package hdf5 for versions less than 1.14.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-32621 affecting package hdf5 for versions less than 1.14.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package hdf5 is earlier than 1.14.4-1, affected by CVE-2024-32621
